WHUK's High Performance HA VMware Cloud with SSD, SAS & SATA,with 20 GB R1Soft BackUp

WHUK, a company backed by an industry leading experience of 10 years specializes in providing cost effective and reliable hosting solutions that ensures complete web hosting efficiency. With a cluster comprising of Dell R620S Dual Quad and Hexa-Core Processor servers, with 96 GB RAM in each. Each server is configured in RAID and is dual powered from two separate power feeds. A redundant 10 Gbit Arista switches for the internal network and an EMC Isilon storage cluster for the remote storage device housed in a state of the art Tier4 datacenter in the UK, WHUK offers an opportunity with hosting in the cloud and ensure the best in class performance for mission critical and personal websites. Fully managed services and 24x7 free support is something that is default with services.

VMware cloud plans are now available with an option to choose between SSD’s, SAS and SATA storage at WHUK.

..::.. VMWARE CLOUD Plans (Linux) ..::..

CPU: 800 Mhz - 8 x 2.2 GHz (8 Cores)
Disk: 25 GB - 500 GB (SSD / SAS / SATA)
Bandwidth: 1000 GB
RAM: 1 GB - 12 GB
OS: Linux CentOS 6.x, Fedora Core 10, Debian5, Ubuntu 9.x
Control Panel: cPanel/WHM, Plesk for 10/30/100/Unlimited (at additional charge)
Price: £33.00 GBP

..::.. VMWARE CLOUD Plans (Windows) ..::..

CPU: 800 Mhz - 8 x 2.2 GHz (8 Cores)
Disk: 25 GB - 500 GB (SSD / SAS / SATA)
Bandwidth: 1000 GB
RAM: 1 GB - 12 GB
OS: Windows 2008 R2 / Windows 2012 Standard
Control Panel: Plesk for 10/30/100/Unlimited (at additional charge)
Price: £38.00 GBP

Disk Options for Linux and Windows VMware Cloud:
SATA : 25GB | 45GB | 65GB | 100GB | 150GB | 300GB | 500GB
SAS : 25GB | 45GB | 65GB | 100GB | 150GB | 500GB
SSD : 30GB | 100GB

Extras
  • R1Soft CDP Backup Space : 20GB (Free)| 25GB(£5) | 50GB (£10) | 100GB (£15) | Upto 500GB (£35)
  • SpamExperts Spam Filter : 5,10,25,50,100 upto 500 Domains at price ranging from £3 - £270 GBP

About WHUK
WHUK, a web hosting company in the UK since 2001, announced the special festive season offerings on nearly all services they provide. People can save upto 25% on cloud and dedicated hosting services. The services come equipped with powerful features capable of serving wide range of requirements. Both, cloud and dedicated hosting packages are power packed and fully equipped with the best in-class features. With the infrastructural set-up housed at state-of-the-art Tier 4 Datacenter in the UK, you can expect the best uptime ever.

For any information with regards to festive discounts and offers, please contact our sales department by initiating a chat or by dropping an email to sales @ webhosting.uk.com or call us on 0808-262-0855 / +44-191-303-8069.
